title: DRAVEN'S LEGENDARY SPINNING AXES
body: Sooooooooooooooo...anyone got a small 1820 spare rp in there account which they could kindly use to gift me a legendary skin so they could get the DRAAAAVEN ICON?It's a win win for both of us.

replies.body: Not a chance buddy. Your best bet is to hit up one of your irl friends ans organise a trade (don't trust anyone you haven't met irl/spent a good deal of time with).
